query: How can I convert an audio file to text?
response_text: Here are the simplest ways to convert audio to text, depending on what you’re using:  Fast & Easy (no setup)  Google Docs → Tools → Voice typing (play the audio near your mic)  Otter.ai → upload audio, get transcript  Microsoft Word → Dictate → Transcribe  YouTube → upload audio as a video → auto captions → download transcript  Best Accuracy (especially long files)  Whisper (OpenAI) – very accurate, supports many languages  Use via tools like MacWhisper, Audacity plugin, or CLI  Rev.com – paid, human-level accuracy  Mobile  iPhone: Voice Memos → Transcribe  Android: Google Recorder app  If you want code (Python)  pythonCopy codeimport whisper  model = whisper.load_model("base")  result = model.transcribe("audio.mp3")  print(result["text"])  If you want, tell me:  file type (mp3, wav, etc.)  device (phone, Mac, Windows)  free vs paid preference  I’ll point you to the best option.
